verses.verse: In you<WH3068>, O Lord, do I put my trust<WH2620>; let me never<WH408> be ashamed<WH954>: deliver<WH6403> me in your righteousness<WH6666>.
Bow down<WH5186> your ear<WH241> to me<WH5337>; deliver me speedily<WH4120>: be you my strong<WH4581> rock<WH6697>, for a house<WH1004> of defense<WH4686> to save me<WH3467>.
For you are my rock<WH5553> and my fortress<WH4686>; therefore for your name<WH8034>'s sake lead<WH5148> me<WH5095>, and guide me.
Pull me out<WH3318> of the net<WH7568> that<WH2098> they have laid secretly<WH2934> for me<WH4581>: for you are my strength.
Into your hand<WH3027> I commit<WH6485> my spirit<WH7307>: you have redeemed<WH6299> me<WH3068>, O Lord God<WH410> of truth<WH571>.
I have hated<WH8130> them that regard<WH8104> lying<WH7723> vanities<WH1892>: but I trust<WH982> in the Lord<WH3068>.
I will be glad<WH1523> and rejoice<WH8055> in your mercy<WH2617>: for you have considered<WH7200> my trouble<WH6040>; you have known<WH3045> my soul<WH5315> in adversities<WH6869>;
And have not shut me up<WH5462> into the hand<WH3027> of the enemy<WH341>: you have set<WH5975> my feet<WH7272> in a large room<WH4800>.
Have mercy<WH2603> upon me<WH3068>, O Lord, for I am in trouble<WH6887>: my eye<WH5869> is consumed<WH6244> with grief<WH3708>, Yes<WH5315>, my soul and my belly<WH990>.

For my life<WH2416> is spent<WH3615> with grief<WH3015>, and my years<WH8141> with sighing<WH585>: my strength<WH3581> fails<WH3782> because of my iniquity<WH5771>, and my bones<WH6106> are consumed<WH6244>.

I was a reproach<WH2781> among all my enemies<WH6887>, but especially<WH3966> among my neighbors<WH7934>, and a fear<WH6343> to my acquaintance<WH3045>: they that did see<WH7200> me outside<WH2351> fled from me<WH5074>.
I am forgotten<WH7911> as a dead man<WH4191> out of mind<WH3820>: I am like a broken<WH6> vessel<WH3627>.

For I have heard<WH8085> the slander<WH1681> of many<WH7227>: fear<WH4032> was on every side<WH5439>: while they took counsel<WH3245> together<WH3162> against me<WH2161>, they devised to take away<WH3947> my life<WH5315>.
But I trusted<WH982> in you<WH3068>, O Lord: I said<WH559>, You are my God<WH430>.
My times<WH6256> are in your hand<WH3027>: deliver<WH5337> me from the hand<WH3027> of my enemies<WH341>, and from them that persecute me<WH7291>.
Make your face<WH6440> to shine<WH215> upon your servant<WH5650>: save<WH3467> me for your mercies<WH2617>' sake.
Let me not be ashamed<WH954>, O Lord<WH3068>; for I have called<WH7121> upon you<WH7563>: let the wicked be ashamed<WH954>, and let them be silent<WH1826> in the grave<WH7585>.
Let the lying<WH8267> lips<WH8193> be put to silence<WH481>; which speak<WH1696> severe<WH6277> things proudly<WH1346> and contemptuously<WH937> against the righteous<WH6662>.

Oh how great<WH7227> is your goodness<WH2898>, which you have laid up<WH6845> for them that fear<WH3373> you<WH6466>; which you have done for them that trust<WH2620> in you before the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>!

You shall hide<WH5641> them in the secret<WH5643> of your presence<WH6440> from the pride<WH7407> of man<WH376>: you shall keep them secretly<WH6845> in a pavilion<WH5521> from the strife<WH7379> of tongues<WH3956>.
Blessed<WH1288> be the Lord<WH3068>: for he has showed me his marvelous<WH6381> kindness<WH2617> in a strong<WH4692> city<WH5892>.

For I said<WH559> in my haste<WH2648>, I am cut off<WH1629> from before<WH5048> your eyes<WH5869>: nevertheless<WH403> you heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of my supplications<WH8469> when I cried unto you<WH7768>.
O love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068>, all you his saints<WH2623>: for the Lord<WH3068> preserves<WH5341> the faithful<WH539>, and fully<WH3499> pays back<WH7999> the arrogant<WH1346> doer<WH6213>.
Be of good courage<WH2388>, and he shall strengthen<WH553> your heart<WH3824>, all you that hope<WH3176> in the Lord<WH3068>.
